MeetRice: ^<color=#ffffffff>A girl with white like hair is standing alone, quietly minding her business.
^<color=#ffffffff>When you approach, she glances at you briefly, her gaze cool but not unfriendly.
^<color=#d02214>Ah, that must of came out rudely...
^<color=#d02214>I’m not interested in talking much if that's why you came here.
^<color=#d02214>But, hi, I guess, I'm Rice, and...
^<color=#d02214>Um, if you need something, say it. If not... I’d rather be left alone now.
^<color=#ffffffff>Her tone is flat but she is trying to be somewhat nice, even if it appears distant.
^<color=#ffffffff>Well, might just be easier to move along now.
